name: Brackets-xunit
tagline: A brackets extension to run various unit test frameworks
body:
### Brackets Xunit
This extension makes it easy for you to write & maintain unit tests for your javascript code written in QUnit, Jasmine or YUI.

### Usage
First install the extension then save any QUnit, Jasmine or YUI javascript file to run it and see the test results.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
